channel.title: I need help

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Volcom_T Volcom T
item.description:
@Volcom_T wrote:

to change the items
amount of money go to Item.cfg file
and look for the item in there
and the 3 big numbers is the amount of money.
hmm so it like this

item = ### Item_Name Help_you? 1 1 1

the (1) is were the money amount is but there are more after that and those are stats
the (###) is item id and (item name) is the name of item so when
u trade and accept it it will say the item name not (NONE EXISTING ITEM) or wat ever

and making it admin item hmmm
it depends on what sever you have
i cant really help you there

Read full topic
